RTâ€‚dropknowledge.eth (ğŸŒ±,ğŸŒ³)
My web3 story?
4 months ago at a bar, a girl asked me if I liked NFTs.
Never heard of them.
Dove headfirst down the rabbit hole. Bought @developer_dao #6162. 
Texted girl.
Never heard from her.
~ Yada yada yada ~
Today, I left my job to help build D_D to its full potential
